product.title: Heajfvd Flat Iron Comb Attachment Clip-in Hair Straightener Comb Attachment Detachable Electric Hair Iron Accessories Women Hair Brush Styling Tools
product.description:
High Temperature Resistant Material: Crafted from cutting-edge high temperature resistant material, our comb attachment can endure up to 500 degrees Celsius without softening or melting. Enjoy worry-free styling process with no heat damage concerns or material deterioration worries.
Damage-Free Styling: Featuring flat iron blades, our comb attachment ensures smooth, stress-free hair straightening. The gentle process minimizes heat damage, leaving your hair naturally luscious and healthy-looking after each use.
Super Time Saver: Tired of juggling a hair straightener and comb simultaneously? Our flat iron brush streamlines your styling routine by allowing one-handed operation. Bid farewell to steam and burned fingers while saving valuable time – making appointments quicker and hassle-free.
Portable Split Design: Designed with a convenient split detachable structure, our hair straightener comb attachment accommodates various straightener sizes. Effortlessly disassemble for easy portability and storage, ideal for on-the-go touch-ups or travel without occupying much space.
Ideal Gift Choice: The flat iron comb attachment clip makes for a practical and innovative gift, enabling effortless achievement of dreamy straight hair. Whether for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions, this thoughtful present showcases care while saving time for romantic date preparations.

Description:
Introducing our comb attachment, designed for efficient and damage-free styling. Crafted from advanced high temperature resistant material, this comb attachment can withstand up to 500 degrees Celsius without softening or melting, ensuring durability and integrity during use. Say goodbye to heat damage worries!
Equipped with flat iron blades, this attachment offers smooth and stress-free hair straightening, reducing heat damage for a naturally luscious look. Save time and effort with its one-hand operation, eliminating the need to juggle a hair straightener and comb separately. The innovative split detachable design makes it portable and easy to carry, perfect for travel and on-the-go styling.
Looking for an ideal gift choice? Our flat iron comb attachment is a practical and thoughtful present for anyone seeking dream straight hair effortlessly. Whether it's a birthday, holiday, or special occasion, this gift will showcase your care and consideration while saving time for that special date. 

Item Name: Comb Attachment 
Material: Plastic
Features: Hair Styling Tools, Easy to Install, Flat Iron Accessories 
Size Details:
Length: 8.7cm/3.43" (Approx.)

Notes:
Due to the light and screen setting difference, the item's color may be slightly different from the pictures.
Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement.

Package Includes:
1 x Comb Attachment
